kDesc
A new, designer bed for guys. Exclusive to the VEEMEE 3D Printer. [#Legal]
Un nouveau lit très tendance pour garçons. Exclusif à l'Imprimante VEEMEE 3D. [#Legal]
Neues Designerbett für Jungen. Exklusiv beim VEEMEE 3D-Drucker. [#Legal]
Un nuovo letto griffato per ragazzi. In esclusiva per la Stampante 3D VEEMEE. [#Legal]
Una nueva cama de diseño para chico. En exclusiva para la Impresora VEEMEE 3D. [#Legal]

A new, designer bed for guys. Exclusive to the VEEMEE 3D Printer. \n\n※ Active items provide more functionality than normal items. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time. [#Legal]
